mapper.insert: insert into ADMIN(ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PASS, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL) values (#{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select ADMIN_ID as "id", ADMIN_PASS as "pass" from ADMIN where ADMIN_ID = #{id} and ADMIN_PASS = #{pass}
select ADMIN_ID as "id", ADMIN_PASS as "pass", ADMIN_NAME as "name", ADMIN_PHONE as "phone", ADMIN_EMAIL as "email" from ADMIN where ADMIN_ID = #{id}
